```{r ,collapse=TRUE,message=F}
library(BiocProject)
bp=BiocProject()
bp
projectConfig = system.file(
"extdata",
"example_peps-master",
"example_derived",
"project_config.yaml",
package = "pepr"
)
bpl = loadPEP(bp,file = projectConfig)
bpl
samples(bpl)
```
